name: Baalakut
description:
Baalakut is a 3rd Person Shooter Boss Rush game developed by university students of Tecnocampus Mataró.

The game was developed in ten weeks for the subject Projecte de creació III.

Al Menos Compila Games is composed by:

  • Yeray Bartolomé: Artist
  • Nikola Nikolaev: Artist
  • Roger Perales: Programmer
  • Alvaro de Pablos: Programmer
  • Pau López: Designer
  • Gonzalo Marcos: Producer & Designer

We really hope you enjoy our game! :)
